thread.section_title: Luna & Simone Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly staff, comfortable rooms
thread.title_full: Friendly staff, comfortable rooms - Review of Luna & Simone Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: samanthaschlein
title: Friendly staff, comfortable rooms
text:
We loved the Luna & Simone! We stayed five nights and not once were we disappointed. . The rooms are small, but comfortable and clean. The breakfasts are delicious. The staff is wonderful; accommodating and cheerful. Centrally located for easy access to most of London. Would absolutely return.
Room Tip: Ask for a room with a balcony, it's lovely. See more room tips
